content: quote: Originally posted by YankeeeSgt: Freinds & medals are small stuff. I lost my name remember? Lost your name, huh? That's what happened to Prince. His name became an unpronouncable doodle. Folks called him The Artist formerly known as Prince. Now he's back to being Prince. Found his name I guess. But now I call him "The artist formerly known as the artist formerly known as Prince." And my point is....crap...I forgot... Look at the bright side. Your log on name never became a bad word that was editied like mine. Once more, "Scooter" is A-OK!
